TopicTitle: My first landing on Minimus in the new patch.

Articles.Content: The rocket I made does a really good job, as you can see I have lots of fuel left to get home, and I ditched my third stage with a whole tank of fuel left, they need to add other planets.

Lovely ship, and well done!

With the amount of delta v that ship has, and Minimus\'s low gravity, you could have just fallen to within a kilometer of the surface and slowed to a landing at the end.

But it\'s fun to sight-see. Minimus looks COLD.
You can EVA your kerbals into orbit from a landed rover on minmus. Go try it! you know it makes sense....

You can EVA your kerbals into orbit from a landed rover on minmus. Go try it! you know it makes sense....

How do you calculate the necessary delta V versus altitude?

Lovely ship, and well done!

With the amount of delta v that ship has, and Minimus\'s low gravity, you could have just fallen to within a kilometer of the surface and slowed to a landing at the end.

But it\'s fun to sight-see. Minimus looks COLD.

I know, but then I wouldn\'t have had such a dramatic video to put that lovely music to.

Thanks for the compliment on the ship.
Wow that was super eerie music hahah perfect for landing on a strange moon. Cool lander design too.
